title: Tâches
downloadUrlExpiresAt: Le téléchargement de l'URL expire à

repeat.confirm: Placer la tâche dans la file d'attente
repeat.confirmed: Job has been pushed to the queue

warning.title: Warning: risk of data modification - Proceed with caution
warning.subtitle: This action may modify existing data.

error.title: Danger: risk of data loss - Proceed with extreme caution
error.subtitle: This action replaces existing data. Ensure you have a backup before proceeding.

alert.1: The copy operation will delete all existing data in the target locale and replace it with data from the source locale.

LocaleFoodNutrientMapping._: Régional - Exporter le mapping des nutriments

LocaleFoodRankingUpload._: Régional - téléchargement du CSV de classement d'aliments

alert.1: The food frequency data is automatically updated by the system as new recalls are received.
alert.2: Uploading frequency data from a CSV file will override existing records in the database, potentially leading to data loss.
alert.3: This feature is intended only for initialising new locales or fixing issues with existing frequency data.

LocaleIndexBuild._: Locale - Rebuild Food Indexes for modified locales

NutrientTableMappingImport._: Tableau des nutriments - Importer le mapping de la BDD nutritionnelle

alert.1: The import process will update mapping for all nutrients and fields.

NutrientTableDataImport._: Tableau des nutriments - Importer les données de la BDD nutritionnelle

alert.1: The import process will update nutrient values for all foods in the nutrient table based on the provided mapping.

PopularitySearchUpdateCounters._: Chercher - Mettre à jour les compteurs de popularité

SurveyDataExport._: Enquête - Soumission de l'export de données

SurveyFeedbackNotification._: Enquête - Envoyer le bilan du répondant

SurveyNutrientsRecalculation._: Enquête - Carculer à nouveau les nutriments

alert.1: This job will recalculate nutrient values for all survey submissions.
alert.2: Depending on the number of submissions, this process may take a significant amount of time to complete.

UserEmailVerificationNotification._: Utilisateur - Notification de vérification de l'adresse mail

UserPasswordResetNotification._: Utilisateur - Envoyer la réinitialisation du mot de passe
